channel.title: Java_infs on Operators & Cycles in Java, Python, Bash
channel.description: Recent content in Java_infs on Operators & Cycles in Java, Python, Bash

item.title: Java
item.description: IF if (condition) { commands } IF-ELSE IF-ELSE if (condition) { commands } else if { commands } else { commands } FOR for (initialization; condition; iteration) { commands } WHILE while (condition) { commands } SWITCH switch (variable) { case constant1: commands break; case constant2: commands break; case constant3: commands break; default: commands }
